description.ruby-sapphire:
Attacks with sharp fangs
and cuts half the foe’s HP.
description.emerald:
Attacks with sharp fangs
and cuts half the foe’s HP.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user attacks
with sharp fangs
and halves the
foe’s HP.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user chomps hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s
HP to half.
description.platinum:
The user chomps hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s
HP to half.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user chomps hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s
HP to half.
description.black-white:

target with its sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s HP to half.
description.black-2-white-2:

target with its sharp front fangs.

description.x-y:
The user chomps hard on the
target with its sharp front fangs.
This cuts the target’s HP in half.

This cuts the target’s HP in half.

effect.full: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target's remaining HP.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.
